import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Comment = ({User}) => { useEffect(()=>{ console.log(User); },[]) return (

{User.bio}

{User.username}
Growth
3 replies
7H ago
42
) } export default Comment
